price: 32 et qui, toutes sans exception, seront devant Nous appelées à comparaître ?
arabic: وَإِن كُلّٞ لَّمَّا جَمِيعٞ لَّدَيۡنَا مُحۡضَرُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: wa-in kullun lammā jamīʿun ladaynā muḥ'ḍarūna
